entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 12:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Wet snow over higher terrain late this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or wet snow changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
